Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class xsens::JanitorRCDeallocationPolicy_Delete< T >

Reference counting janitor class.

This class can be used to make sure that the associated pointer is deleted when the last janitor for it leaves scope.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename T >
xsens::JanitorRCDeallocationPolicy_Delete< T >::~JanitorRCDeallocationPolicy_Delete ( )
inlineprotected

Destructor.

Note
Always use non-virtual protected destructors in policies
